Description
amanda box,  is intelligent thermostat which provided by Hysen ，To use your Amazon Echo with your amanda box，make sure you have the latest Alexa app on your device, you have your amanda box, and activate the Hysen Skill, This will require your amanda box app account email and password to authorize Alexa to access your devices. To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your Hysen account and discover your devices.When using the skill, you need to specify by name which device to use. You can set the devices' name in amanda box app which controls your devices. you can find the exact amanda box app name in your product user manuel. 
Your amanda box now talk directly to the Amazon Echo through the Alexa. You can control your device with simple statements like:
Alexa, ask amanda box to turn on the bedroom('bedroom is device alias')
Alexa, ask amanda box to turn off the bedroom
Alexa, ask amanda box to set the bedroom to 20 degree
Alexa, ask amanda box to what's the bedroom 's temperature.
Alexa, ask amanda box to what's bedroom thermostat set to 
Alexa, ask amanda box to set bedroom to auto mode
Alexa, ask amanda box to set bedroom to manual mode
Alexa, ask amanda box to Cancel,See you,Bye,Exit (Exit session mode )
Alexa, ask amanda box to help

if you have any questions, please visit Hysen website or email kolek@cn-hysen.com for further assistance.
